tokens.name: pengpin / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:
**Rationale:**

- **LIMIT ORDER:** Medium volatility (16.1% price change) → -2% to -5% range; mid-range at -3%.  
- **TAKE PROFIT:** Low volume (<$3k) → +5% to +10% range; mid-range at +7.5%.  
- **STOP LOSS:** Medium volatility → -8% to -15% range; mid-range at -11.5%.  
- **TIME FRAME:** Low volume → 2h to 6h; mid-range at 4h.  
- **Flow Momentum:** Stable → standard parameters applied.
